User Login Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Tools»User Name to display this dialog box.

Use this dialog box to set or change your LabVIEW user name. By default, LabVIEW logs in the system user automatically, but you can access the LabVIEW system as a different user.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Username—Type your user name in the field or select your name from the pull-down menu.
  • Previous Users—Contains all user names that previously logged in to this installation of LabVIEW. The other option in the pull-down menu is for new users who have not logged in to this installation previously. It is selected automatically when LabVIEW does not recognize the name being typed in the text box.
